rules_text:
Reach
Infect [i](This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)[/i]
[i]Unexplained Fever – [/i]Whenever a creature dies, if it had a -1/-1 counter on it, proliferate. This ability triggers only once each turn. [i](To proliferate, choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
